website_summaries.verdict: A very comfortable umpire mask that is easy to adjust to make fit.
pros: Weighs only 18 ounces with hollow wire construction
Includes forehead, ear, and throat guards and adjustable harness
Drytek leather pads help wick sweat
cons: Might not be ideal for umpires of adult games

customer_reviews.title: $45? This should be $145. Not joking at all.
customer_reviews.text: This is as lite as an expensive titanium mask. And only $45? Are you kidding me. I liked mine so much i ordered a second one within the same week. This thing is worth 3 times the price. Hurry before they figure it out. lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Azzopardi.

customer_reviews.title: like not wearing a mask at all
customer_reviews.text: My husband says that he has never experienced a mask so comfortable--lightweight and adjustable......like not wearing a mask at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Best hidden gem for umpires
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a tank. Better than the expensive Wilson I bought. Had this for 4 years now and not a crack or anything. I do high school and college baseball and it has taken its hits.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Showing signs of wear
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight, comfy but is showing wear in the pads after only about 15 games....just not expected. I would not buy again, but it’s not bad either...
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Very light...thick padding
customer_reviews.text: Alot of padding. Very light. Took 3 foul balls off face at high school game, one spun mark off. Did its job. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Kipper

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance with this mask after reading the reviews. Most lightweight masks are $80-$125. Gave it a shot and have used it for about 20 games so far. Just took a straight back foul tip directly into it. No dent, scratches and it displaced the energy nicely. No injury. Great mask for the value. The only issue is the silver color but I like having something a little different.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Patnaude

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome, SUPER LIGHTWEIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light! My sone was using an old school mack that weighed about 5 pounds and this one is literally like a feather weight compared. Seems plenty sturdy and provide lots of coverage. At he price it was the best value by about 25 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Gabeizrad

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality umpires mask -- and it is light weight (and comfortable).
customer_reviews.author: Rachel and Barry

customer_reviews.title: But after he used it he loved it. It is so lightweight he had no ...
customer_reviews.text: at first my husband was skeptical about this. He was not crazy about the silver cage. But after he used it he loved it. It is so lightweight he had no neck issues with it
customer_reviews.author: VIVOGRAM

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight..
customer_reviews.text: Fits a variety of head sizes, light weight and my husband likes the extra 'handle' at the top.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very light and I have taken a few hits and still held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Kincade

customer_reviews.title: Solid product. Very well made. Incredible how light ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Very well made. Incredible how light they are.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen howe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and super light weight! Enjoy this so much more than the traditional heavier style.
customer_reviews.author: H RYCE

customer_reviews.title: Good mask for the value
customer_reviews.text: The mask is great I wish the straps are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mask I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel like I am wearing a mask. Feather light! I can work a doubleheader with no neck fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz Dahlen

customer_reviews.title: Lightweigt and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight making it much more comfortable than the older, heavier models.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Hunt

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT WEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME MASK VERY VERY LIGHT WEIGHT..LIKE NOT WEARING ANYTHING AT ALL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Champion Sports Ultra Lightweight Baseball Umpire Face Mask - Available in Multiple Colors
product_meta.description: Take your safety gear to the next level with the Champion Sports Ultra Lightweight Baseball Umpire Face Mask. The umpire's mask is made with a hollow wire frame that adds impressive strength to the design, without saddling the umpire with excess weight. DryTek EverClean leather pads wick away moisture and resist bacteria, and resist bacteria mold and mildew helping the umpire to stay cool and dry when the action picks up. The umpire's face mask has extended forehead, ear and throat guards for protection from stray balls, while an adjustable harness holds it in place and allows it to accommodate a wide range of head sizes.
feature_bullets: Durable and lightweight hollow wire construction
Adjustable harness for secure fit on any size head
DryTek EverClean full grain premium leather pads provide efficient sweat wicking and resist bacteria mold and mildew
